DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select B.BoxId as [Box ID], B.BoxCode as [Box Code], B.FBoxDate as [Box Fiscal Date], LA.AccountId as [Box Location ID], LA.AccountCode as [Box Location Code], LA.DisplayName as [Box Location Name], UA.AccountId as [Box User Account ID], UA.AccountCode as [Box User Account Code], UA.DisplayName as [Box User Account Name], BD.BoxDepositId as [BoxDeposit ID], LABD.AccountId as [Location ID], LABD.AccountCode as [Location Code], LABD.DisplayName as [Location Name], OPA.AccountId as [Operating Area ID], OPA.AccountCode as [Operating Area Code], OPA.DisplayName as [Operating Area Name], WKS.WorkstationId as [Workstation ID], WKS.WorkstationCode as [Workstation Code], WKS.WorkstationName as [Workstation Name], UABD.AccountId as [User Account ID], UABD.AccountCode as [User Account Code], UABD.DisplayName as [User Account Name], SA.AccountId as [Supervisor Account ID], SA.AccountCode as [Supervisor Account Code], SA.DisplayName as [Supervisor Account Name], BD.BoxDepositType as [Box Deposit Type Code], dbo.fnLookupItemDesc(64,BD.BoxDepositType) as [Deposit Type Label], convert(varchar, BD.DepositDateTime, 103) as [Deposit Date], SubString(convert(varchar, BD.DepositDateTime, 8), 1, 5) as [Deposit Time], BD.DepositAmount as [Deposit Amount], BD.BagNumber as [Bag Number] from tbBox B left join tbAccount LA on LA.AccountId=B.LocationAccountId left join tbAccount UA on UA.AccountId=B.UserAccountId left join tbBoxDeposit BD on BD.BoxId=B.BoxId left join tbWorkstation WKS on WKS.WorkstationId=BD.WorkstationId left join tbAccount LABD on LABD.AccountId=WKS.LocationAccountId left join tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=WKS.OpAreaAccountId left join tbAccount UABD on UABD.AccountId=BD.UserAccountId left join tbAccount SA on SA.AccountId=BD.SupAccountId where B.FBoxDate>=:@DateFrom and B.FBoxDate<=:@DateTo and (:@WorkstationId is null or WKS.WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId) and (:@OpAreaId is null or WKS.OpAreaAccountId=:@OpAreaId) and (:@LocationId is null or WKS.LocationAccountId=:@LocationId) and (:@UserId is null or B.UserAccountId=:@UserId)

RichDescItem.Description:
Box Deposits

Abstract

“Box Deposits” generates a report of the Financial Statement within a selected period at your choice filtered by Location, Operating Area, Workstation and User.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by
  • [Datasource] – Data source easy-to-select by eligible users (please refer to SnApp BKO >> Templates >> Statistical Reports >> Audit >> Profile)
  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed, easy-to-select.
    • Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
  • [Location] – Site Location, easy-to-select. When select -empty-, default is all the locations
  • [Operating Area] – Operating area, easy-to-select. When select -empty-, default is all the operating areas.
  • [User] – Site User Name. When select -empty-, default is all the users.
  • [Workstation] – Site Workstation Name. When select -empty-, default is all the workstations.
 
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters
  • [Title Report] - Box Deposit Details
  • [Execution date/time] -  Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation].
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected analysis period.
  • [Location] – Site Location Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE LOCATION CODE] Site Location Name". Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the Locations' exposure are analysed and listed
  • [Operating Area] – Site Operating Area Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE OPERATING AREA CODE] Site Operating Area Name". Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the Operating Area' exposure are analysed and listed
  • [User] – Site User Name. Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the Workstation' exposure are analysed and listed
  • [Workstation] – Site Workstation Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE WORKSTATION CODE] Site Workstation Name". Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the Workstation' exposure are analysed and listed

Contents (by columns)

  • [Box ID]: Box Maintenance ID Group.
  • [BoxCode]: Box Maintenance Code Group.
  • [Box Fiscal Date]: Box Maintenance Fiscal Date.
  • [Box Location ID]: Box Maintenance Location ID
  • [Box Location Code]: Box Maintenance Location Code
  • [Box Location Name]: Box Maintenance Location Name
  • [Box Account User  ID]: Box Maintenance Account User ID
  • [Box Account User Code]: Box Maintenance Account User Code
  • [Box Account User Name]: Box Maintenance Account User Name
  • [Box Deposit ID]: Box  Maintenance Deposit ID
  • [Location ID]: Site Location ID
  • [Location Code]: Site Location Code
  • [Location Name]: Site Location Name
  • [Operating Area ID]: Operation Area ID
  • [Operating Area Code]: Operation Area Code
  • [Operating Area Name]: Operation Area Name
  • [Workstation ID]: Workstation ID
  • [Workstation Code]: Workstation Code
  • [Workstation Name]: Workstation Name
  • [User Account ID]: User Account ID 
  • [User Account Code]: User Account Code 
  • [User Account Name]: User Account Name
  • [Supervisor Account ID]: Supervisor Account ID
  • [Supervisor Account Code]: Supervisor Account Code
  • [Supervisor Account Name]: Supervisor Account Name
  • [Box Deposit Type]: Box Maintenance Deposit Type Code # (see "DepositType Description" here below)
  • [Deposit Type Label]  Deposit Type Description (see Lookup Table "Box Deposit Type" table - Table Code: 64)
    1: Box Creation
    2: Initial Fund
    3: Withdraw
    4: Deposit
    5: Final Close
    6: Reopened By User
    7: Reopened By System
    8: Closed By System
    9: Audit
    10: Final Close Suspended
    11: Cash drawer manually opened
  • [Deposit Date]: Deposit Date (format as selected Calendar format)      
  • [Deposit Time]:  Deposit Time (format as selected Timing format)
  • [Deposit Amount]:  Deposit Amount Value in selected currency
  • [Bag Number]: Bag Number
